Description: Limestone ostracon with text containing an acknowledgment of debt.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.120, pl.83)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82818) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82818)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. I 83:2 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
